About the Breeder

Passion for the Szegedin Highflyer

In Brief

I've been attracted to pigeons since childhood. The Szegedin Highflyer captivated me from the first moment - the elegance of their flight, their colorful plumage, and their unique character immediately caught my attention.

I have been working with this wonderful breed for more than five decades. I believe that the Szegedin Highflyer is part of Hungary's cultural heritage and it's important to pass it on to the next generations.

What Matters

The health and welfare of the birds come first

Respect for the breed standard

Preservation of traditional values

Knowledge sharing with other breeders

Experience

More than 50 years breeding the breed

Active member of the Hungarian National Association of Pigeon and Small Animal Breeders

Regular participation in exhibitions and meetings

Connections with breeders at home and abroad

Learn more about the breed

Discover the uniqueness of the Szegedin Highflyer!

About the Breed

Szegedin Highflyer Breeding

Breeding Szegedin Highflyer pigeons with more than 50 years of experience.
